verses.text: \w Therefore|strong="G5620"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* dearly \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* longed \w for|strong="G1973"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w crown|strong="G4735"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* stand \w fast|strong="G4739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \add my\add* dearly \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*.

I \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w Euodias|strong="G2136"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w Syntyche|strong="G4941"\w*, that they be of the same mind \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w intreat|strong="G2065"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w true|strong="G1103"\w* \w yokefellow|strong="G4805"\w*, \w help|strong="G4815"\w* those \w women|strong="G0846"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w laboured|strong="G4866"\w* with \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w Clement|strong="G2815"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add with\add* \w other|strong="G3062"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w fellowlabourers|strong="G4904"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w names|strong="G3686"\w* \add are\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w book|strong="G0976"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w Rejoice|strong="G5463"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w alway|strong="G3842"\w*: \add and\add* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* I \w say|strong="G2046"\w*, \w Rejoice|strong="G5463"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1097"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w moderation|strong="G1933"\w* be \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \w unto|strong="G0444"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*. The \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \add is\add* at \w hand|strong="G1451"\w*.

Be \w careful|strong="G3309"\w* for \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* every \w thing|strong="G3956"\w* by \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w supplication|strong="G1162"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="G2169"\w* \w let|strong="G1107"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w requests|strong="G0155"\w* be made \w known|strong="G1107"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, which \w passeth|strong="G5242"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w understanding|strong="G3563"\w*, shall \w keep|strong="G5432"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w minds|strong="G3540"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w Finally|strong="G3063"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, whatsoever \w things|strong="G3745"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*, whatsoever \w things|strong="G3745"\w* \add are\add* \w honest|strong="G4586"\w*, whatsoever \w things|strong="G3745"\w* \add are\add* \w just|strong="G1342"\w*, whatsoever \w things|strong="G3745"\w* \add are\add* \w pure|strong="G0053"\w*, whatsoever \w things|strong="G3745"\w* \add are\add* \w lovely|strong="G4375"\w*, whatsoever \w things|strong="G3745"\w* \add are\add* of good \w report|strong="G2163"\w*; \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \add there be\add* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w virtue|strong="G0703"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \add there be\add* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w praise|strong="G1868"\w*, think \w on|strong="G3049"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*.

Those \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w have|strong="G3129"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w learned|strong="G3129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w received|strong="G3880"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*, \w do|strong="G4238"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w rejoiced|strong="G5463"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w greatly|strong="G3171"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w now|strong="G2235"\w* at the \w last|strong="G4218"\w* your \w care|strong="G5426"\w* \w of|strong="G5228"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w* hath \w flourished|strong="G0330"\w* again; \w where|strong="G3739"\w*\w in|strong="G1909"\w* ye \w were|strong="G5426"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w careful|strong="G5426"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* ye lacked \w opportunity|strong="G0170"\w*.

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* I \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* in respect \w of|strong="G2596"\w* \w want|strong="G5304"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* have \w learned|strong="G3129"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="G3739"\w* state I \w am|strong="G1510"\w*, \add therewith\add* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w content|strong="G0842"\w*.

I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w how|strong="G1492"\w* to be \w abased|strong="G5013"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I know \w how|strong="G1492"\w* to \w abound|strong="G4052"\w*: every \w where|strong="G3956"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* I am \w instructed|strong="G3453"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* to be \w full|strong="G5526"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to be \w hungry|strong="G3983"\w*, \w both|strong="G2532"\w* to \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to suffer \w need|strong="G5302"\w*.

I can \w do|strong="G2480"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w strengtheneth|strong="G1743"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*.

\w Notwithstanding|strong="G4133"\w* ye \w have|strong="G4160"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w*, that ye did \w communicate|strong="G4790"\w* \w with|strong="G2347"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w affliction|strong="G2347"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w Philippians|strong="G5374"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* I \w departed|strong="G1831"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*, \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w* communicated \w with|strong="G2841"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w concerning|strong="G3056"\w* \w giving|strong="G1394"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w receiving|strong="G3028"\w*, \w but|strong="G3361"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Thessalonica|strong="G2332"\w* ye \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w once|strong="G0530"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G1364"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G3427"\w* \w necessity|strong="G5532"\w*.

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w because|strong="G3754"\w* I \w desire|strong="G1934"\w* a \w gift|strong="G1390"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* I \w desire|strong="G1934"\w* \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* that may \w abound|strong="G4121"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w account|strong="G3056"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w have|strong="G0568"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w abound|strong="G4052"\w*: I am \w full|strong="G4137"\w*, having \w received|strong="G1209"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w Epaphroditus|strong="G1891"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \add which were sent\add* \w from|strong="G3844"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, an \w odour|strong="G3744"\w* of a sweet \w smell|strong="G2175"\w*, a \w sacrifice|strong="G2378"\w* \w acceptable|strong="G1184"\w*, \w wellpleasing|strong="G2101"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* shall \w supply|strong="G4137"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \add be\add* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w saint|strong="G0040"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*. The brethren which \w are|strong="G0080"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w* \w greet|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w All|strong="G3956"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* \w salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w chiefly|strong="G3122"\w* they that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Caesarâ€™s|strong="G2541"\w* \w household|strong="G3614"\w*.

The \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*. It was written to the Philippians from Rome by Epaphroditus.
